scripts.migrate:dev: sh -c 'test -n "$DATABASE_URL" || { echo "Error: set DATABASE_URL first"; exit 1; }; psql "$DATABASE_URL" -v ON_ERROR_STOP=1 -f migrations/0001_init.sql'
scripts.seed:dev: sh -c 'test -n "$DATABASE_URL" || { echo "Error: set DATABASE_URL first"; exit 1; }; psql "$DATABASE_URL" -v ON_ERROR_STOP=1 -f migrations/0002_seed.sql'
scripts.setup:dev: pnpm run migrate:dev && pnpm run seed:dev
scripts.migrate:staging: sh -c 'test -n "$STAGING_DATABASE_URL" || { echo "Error: set STAGING_DATABASE_URL first"; exit 1; }; psql "$STAGING_DATABASE_URL" -v ON_ERROR_STOP=1 -f migrations/0001_init.sql'
scripts.seed:staging: sh -c 'test -n "$STAGING_DATABASE_URL" || { echo "Error: set STAGING_DATABASE_URL first"; exit 1; }; psql "$STAGING_DATABASE_URL" -v ON_ERROR_STOP=1 -f migrations/0002_seed.sql'
scripts.migrate:prod: sh -c 'test -n "$PROD_DATABASE_URL" || { echo "Error: set PROD_DATABASE_URL first"; exit 1; }; psql "$PROD_DATABASE_URL" -v ON_ERROR_STOP=1 -f migrations/0001_init.sql'
